key.name: background
key.summary: Background image file to use, either an image path or a color (e.g. #772953).

key.name: background-color
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #772953), set before wallpaper is seen.

key.name: high-contrast-background-color
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #000000 or #FFFFFF) for high contrast mode.

key.name: togglebox-font-fgcolor
key.summary: Font foreground color (e.g. #A0A0A0) for non-active/-hovered and non-selected session names in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-font-fgcolor-active
key.summary: Font foreground color (e.g. #A0A0A0) for the active/hovered-above session name in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-font-fgcolor-selected
key.summary: Font foreground color (e.g. #A0A0A0) for the selected session name in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bgcolor
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #391C31) for non-active/-hovered and non-selected session names in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bgcolor-active
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #391C31) for the active/hovered-above session name in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bgcolor-selected
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #391C31) for the selected session name in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bordercolor
key.summary: Border color (e.g. #391C31) for non-active/-hovered and non-selected session names in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bordercolor-active
key.summary: Border color (e.g. #391C31) for the active/hovered-above session name in the session list.

key.name: togglebox-button-bordercolor-selected
key.summary: Border color (e.g. #391C31) for the selected session name in the session list.

key.name: flatbutton-bgcolor
key.summary: Background color (e.g. #391C31) of flat buttons (e.g. the session chooser icon).

key.name: flatbutton-bordercolor
key.summary: Border color (e.g. #391C31) of flat buttons (e.g. the session chooser icon).

key.name: background-mode
key.summary: Determines how the background image is rendered.

key.name: draw-user-backgrounds
key.summary: Whether to draw user backgrounds.

key.name: draw-grid
key.summary: Whether to draw an overlay grid.

key.name: show-hostname
key.summary: Whether to show the hostname in the menubar.

key.name: show-login-labels
key.summary: Whether to show 'Username:' and 'Password:' labels (etc.) in the login box.

key.name: logo
key.summary: Logo file to use.

key.name: logo-alpha
key.summary: Alpha value for blending the logo onto the background.

key.name: theme-name
key.summary: GTK+ theme to use.

key.name: high-contrast-theme-name
key.summary: GTK+ theme to use in high contrast mode.

key.name: icon-theme-name
key.summary: Icon theme to use.

key.name: high-contrast-icon-theme-name
key.summary: Icon theme to use in high contrast mode.

key.name: cursor-theme-name
key.summary: Cursor theme to use.

key.name: cursor-theme-size
key.summary: Size to use for cursors.

key.name: font-name
key.summary: Font to use.

key.name: window-manager
key.summary: If at all and if yes, which window manager to use.

key.name: xft-antialias
key.summary: Whether to antialias Xft fonts.

key.name: xft-dpi
key.summary: Resolution for Xft in dots per inch.

key.name: xft-hintstyle
key.summary: What degree of hinting to use.

key.name: xft-rgba
key.summary: Type of subpixel antialiasing.

key.name: onscreen-keyboard
key.summary: Whether to enable the onscreen keyboard.

key.name: magnifier-position
key.summary: Position of the magnifier window.

key.name: magnifier
key.summary: Whether to enable the screen magnifier.

key.name: high-contrast
key.summary: Whether to use a high contrast theme.

key.name: screen-reader
key.summary: Whether to enable the screen reader.

key.name: play-ready-sound
key.summary: Whether to play sound when greeter is ready.

key.name: indicators
key.summary: Which indicators to load.

key.name: hidden-users
key.summary: List of usernames that are hidden from the userlist until a special key combination is hit.

key.name: user-filter
key.summary: List of usernames that are to be shown in the userlist only.

key.name: user-filter-always
key.summary: Always filter-out users not listed in user-filter even if user-filter is empty.

key.name: group-filter
key.summary: List of groups that users must be part of to be shown in the userlist (empty list shows all users).

key.name: idle-timeout
key.summary: Number of seconds of inactivity before blanking the screen. Set to 0 to never timeout.

key.name: enable-hidpi
key.summary: Whether to enable HiDPI support

key.name: widget-scaling
key.summary: Scaling factor for UI elements (menubar, icons, promptboxes). Everything except from fonts.

key.name: font-scaling
key.summary: Scaling factor for fonts that can be used to adjust the greeter's font sizes.

key.name: menubar-alpha
key.summary: Alpha value for menubar. Not used in high contrast mode.

key.name: remote-service-configure-uri
key.summary: Default FQDN for host offering Remote Logon Service.

key.name: activate-numlock
key.summary: Whether to activate numlock. This features requires the installation of numlockx.

key.name: only-on-monitor
key.summary: Monitor on which to show the Login GUI.

key.name: onscreen-keyboard-layout
key.summary: Name of the onscreen keyboard layout (see /usr/share/onboard/layouts/*.onboard for available layout names).

key.name: onscreen-keyboard-theme
key.summary: Name of the onscreen keyboard theme (see /usr/share/onboard/themes/*.theme for available theme names).

key.name: high-contrast-onscreen-keyboard-theme
key.summary: Name of the onscreen keyboard theme when in high contrast mode (see /usr/share/onboard/themes/*.theme for available theme names).

key.name: hide-default-xsession
key.summary: Whether to hide the 'lightdm-xsession' default X11 session type.

key.name: hide-x11-sessions
key.summary: Whether to hide X11 sessions.

key.name: hide-wayland-sessions
key.summary: Whether to hide Wayland sessions.

key.name: preferred-sessions
key.summary: Ordered list of preferred desktop sessions (for detecting the default session type).

key.name: shutdown-dialog-timeout
key.summary: Time in seconds until the shutdown dialog forcefully selects the default action. Set to 0 to disable.

key.name: includeonly-sessions
key.summary: Unordered list of include-only desktop sessions (if non-empty, only explicitly listed sessions types will be offered by the greeter). Takes precedence over the excluded-sessions list.

key.name: excluded-sessions
key.summary: Unordered list of excluded desktop sessions (if non-empty, listed sessions types will not be offered by the greeter). Only used if includeonly-sessions is empty.

key.name: geoclue-agent
key.summary: Whether to enable the GeoClue-2.0 agent (enhances ayatana-indicator-display).

key.name: content-align
key.summary: Alignment of the main content

key.name: dash-box-bgcolor
key.summary: The background color of the dash box in #RRGGBB format.

key.name: dash-box-opacity
key.summary: The opacity of the dash box.

key.name: prompt-box-color-normal
key.summary: The normal text color of the prompt box in #RRGGBB format.

key.name: prompt-box-color-error
key.summary: The error text color of the prompt box in #RRGGBB format.

key.name: prompt-box-error-bg-opacity
key.summary: The background opacity of the error message in the prompt box.

key.name: logo-position
key.summary: The position of the logo.

key.name: logo-offset-horizontal
key.summary: The horizontal offset of the logo from the edge of the screen in grid units.

key.name: logo-offset-vertical
key.summary: The vertical offset of the logo from the edge of the screen in grid units.

key.name: error-below-entry
key.summary: Whether to display the error label below the login entry.

key.name: menubar-bgcolor
key.summary: The background color of the menubar in #RRGGBB format.
